Je m'appelle Rémy, je suis développeur F: My name is Rémy, I'm a Junior Front-End Developer !
J’ai commencé à m’intéresser au développ: I became interested in development when I had to create my first portfolio as a young graphic designer. That was a few years ago. I had to do something that was far from best practices, so I used 2-3 tutorials from the OpenClassroom (named siteduzéro back in those days) website.
Au fil des ans, j’ai étendu mon intérêt: Over the years, I've extended my interest in code by tinkering with arduinos, remaking my portfolio, and customizing tumblr themes...
J’ai récemment pris gout au code lorsque: I've recently taken a liking to code when I noticed that all my small bits of knowledge started to come together. I then had a desire to relearn the basics with Scrimba.
En parallèle, j’ai travaillé sur le site: In parallel, I've worked on the website for Swindler and Swindler (the illustration studio of my wife) and the site of one of my friend's architects. I've also done a lot of exercises on FrontEndMentor.
Ces quelques mois d’apprentissage rigour: These few months of rigorous learning have allowed me to be more confident in my skills as a developer.
